title: Comparing code segments to compute average from list

content.question: Which of the following best describes the two code segments?

choices.label: Code segment I displays the correct average, but code segment II does not.
Code segment II displays the correct average, but code segment I does not.
Both code segments display the correct average, but code segment I requires more arithmetic operations than code segment II.
Both code segments display the correct average, but code segment II requires more arithmetic operations than code segment I.

content.answer: Both code segments display the correct average, but code segment I requires more arithmetic operations than code segment II.
